summary: After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.
cast: Dennis Quaid|Aimee Teegarden|Tony Oller|Stephen Ford|Devon Werkheiser|Brett Cullen|Dahlia Waingort Guigui|Conrad Gonzales|Wilbur Penn|Amber Bartlett|Sydney Barrosse|David Christopher|Gabriel Folse|Melody Chase|Cam Banfield|Richard Dillard|Timothy Fall|Connor James|Cheryl Chin|Steve Larkin|Davi Jay|Troy Streuer|Esther Guigui|John Blenn|Paige Creswell|Annie Eileen|Helen Ingham|Ty Suite
title: Beneath the Darkness
